# 

```{r}
my_files <- list.files(pattern = ".docx", path = here("data"),
                       full.names = TRUE, recursive = TRUE, ignore.case = TRUE)

dat <- lnt_read(my_files) #Object of class 'LNT output'
```

```{r}
# create separate dataframes for different types of analysis

meta_df <- dat@meta
articles_df <- dat@articles
paragraphs_df <- dat@paragraphs
```

```{r}
# create another dataframe for headlines
heads <- data_frame(element_id = seq(1:length(meta_df$Headline)), Date = meta_df$Date, Headline = meta_df$Headline)
```
